name: Let's end the virus
description:
A virus has infected your patients and the only way you can stop it is by going in the patients body and killing it as fast as you can and without killing rbc's.

I challenge you to speed run this game.

Made by curious human using unity 3d creator kit for fps.

Subscribe to my channel for informational videos and stuff.

Link to my channel- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnqmdsBGiCgC40W4cFA3DLw
